{{cpp/experimental/fs/title|copy_symlink}}
{{cpp/experimental/fs/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|experimental/filesystem}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=fs_ts|1=
void copy_symlink( const path&amp; from, const path&amp; to );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=fs_ts|1=
void copy_symlink( const path&amp; from, const path&amp; to,
                   error_code&amp; ec );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Copies a symlink to another location.

@1@ Effectively calls {{c|f(read_symlink(from), to)}} where {{tt|f}} is {{c|create_symlink()}} or {{c|create_directory_symlink}} depending on whether {{c|from}} resolves to a file or directory.

@2@ Effectively calls {{c|f(read_symlink(from, ec), to, ec)}} where {{tt|f}} is {{c|create_symlink()}} or {{c|create_directory_symlink}} depending on whether {{c|from}} resolves to a file or directory.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|from|path to a symbolic link to copy}}
{{par|to|destination path of the new symlink}}
{{par|ec|out-parameter for error reporting in the non-throwing overload}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

{{cpp/experimental/fs/error_handling|from|to}}
